case.state: This little birdie wanna play.
You know, I routinely beat J'onn at poker, and he's telepathic!
I'm a Bird of Prey, and I'm on the hunt.
I've thrown down with Batman, you sure you're in my League?
I'll take ~cards~ this time.
Give me... ~cards~.
How about ~cards~?
Hmm... I think ~cards~.
I need ~cards~.
I'll toss ~cards~.
~cards~, please.
Trade me ~cards~.
I'll swap... ~cards~.
~cards~ for me!
I'll trade ~cards~, please.
Oh hey Elaine! Did the X-that-marks-the-spot lead you here?
We can't keep running into each other like this, Harley.
Ooh, a Water Pokémon trainer. I guess getting people wet is your specialty!
So, Samus you're a bounty hunter from space? Do you know Lobo?
Hi Tracer, I'm Black Canary. It's nice to meet another hero.
So, you're Princess Zelda of Hyrule, it's an honor your highness.
There. No more clowning around. Umm, no offense, Harley.
Well hello ladies. Were no men invited tonight?
Oh is this supposed to be a girl's night? Not what I expected when I got invited to strip poker.
And to think, I was worried this was gonna be a night of nothing but pervy guys.
Being the only naked one here means all eyes are on me... Not that I mind.
This is going to be so easy. Like, Condiment King level easy.
You guys haven't played poker until you've played against Batman, J'onn, and Arthur on the Watchtower.
Do you know how many times Harley has tried to get Barbara and me to play this game?
This hand reminds me of the time I beat up the Royal Flush gang.
Tweet tweet, little birdies!
This hand is better than Nightwing's ass.
Even Firestorm's hands aren't this hot!
This hand will keep me warm.
Not losing a stitch with these.
The last time Speedy had a hand this good I suspected she was cheating!
This hand is better than the time I kissed Batman.
Keeping the fishnets on with this hand!
I won't be drowning today Aquaman!
Not even your creepy stares can ruin this hand!
Keep looking, this is as good as it gets for you!
These cards are the good kind of radioactive. Like Captain Atom.
These will keep my Bat-Panties on!
I may be naked, but that's as far as this goes!
Time for some last-minute heroics!
Oh hey Elaine! Did the X-that-marks-the-spot lead you here?
We can't keep running into each other like this, Harley.
Ooh, a Water Pokémon trainer. I guess getting people wet is your specialty!
So, Samus you're a bounty hunter from space? Do you know Lobo?
Hi Tracer, I'm Black Canary. It's nice to meet another hero.
So, you're Princess Zelda of Hyrule, it's an honor your highness.
Well hello ladies. Were no men invited tonight?
Oh is this supposed to be a girl's night? Not what I expected when I got invited to strip poker.
And to think, I was worried this was gonna be a night of nothing but pervy guys.
Being the only naked one here means all eyes are on me... Not that I mind.
No one is going to say anything about this, whatever happens, right?
Ollie thinks I'm on monitor duty.
Not gonna be able to punch my way out of this one.
Could go either way. Not unlike Harley and Ivy.
Well. It could be worse. I could be fighting Doomsday, chasing Reverse-Flash, or be around Booster Gold. Ech!
These cards should do it. Sure. I think?
I wonder if Diana loses when they play on Themyscira...
It's like Wildcat says, "Just gotta keep fighting, no matter what."
I wish I could steal cards the way Amazo steals powers...
As Captain Boomerang would say, "What goes around, comes around."
This might be great, or it could be terrible. Not unlike whenever I fight Shiva.
I don't lose. Unless Harley's around. It's usually her fault.
Luthor may be a scumbag, but at least he has a 12th level intellect.
I suspect some magic is afoot. Is Zatanna here?
I wish Doctor Mid-Nite was here to take out the lights.
I may need some help saving my Bat-Panties.
Next time I arrest Merlyn I should see if he can teach me some sleight of hand.
What was that reflection? Maybe it's Mirror Master! I should probably go and find out...
Maybe my poker face would be better if I wore a mask like The Question.
Oh hey Elaine! Did the X-that-marks-the-spot lead you here?
We can't keep running into each other like this, Harley.
Ooh, a Water Pokémon trainer. I guess getting people wet is your specialty!
So, Samus you're a bounty hunter from space? Do you know Lobo?
Hi Tracer, I'm Black Canary. It's nice to meet another hero.
So, you're Princess Zelda of Hyrule, it's an honor your highness.
Harley, did you swap my cards when I wasn’t looking?
Psst, Harley, I know we had our disagreements in the past... but help a girl out, will you?
Next time, I decide where to spend girl’s night Harley.
Well hello ladies. Were no men invited tonight?
Oh is this supposed to be a girl's night? Not what I expected when I got invited to strip poker.
And to think, I was worried this was gonna be a night of nothing but pervy guys.
Being the only naked one here means all eyes are on me... Not that I mind.
Who dealt this garbage?
Ok who's behind this? Joker? Trickster?
I think we should get a better dealer before this goes any further!
You’re going to look back on this game as one of the stupidest moves you've ever made.
No one could win with this hand!
This hand is like fighting Gorilla Grodd. It stinks, and you end up losing.
This is worse than that time I tried playing Clue with Batman.
I lost my boots, and this hand is a kick in my ass.
These cards are bad. Like Apokoliptic bad.
This hand stinks like Killer Croc.
I doubt even Brainiac could think his way out of this.
You keep dealing me cards like this and I'm going to SCREAM!
These cards are cold ~player~. Cold like Killer Frost.
I already feel naked without my stockings, and now this!
This is worse than that time I was in a band!
You know I can kick all your asses if it comes to it, right?
I'm getting dizzy, is Count Vertigo around?
These cards are uglier than Solomon Grundy, and I think he's dead, technically.
How could I make that mistake!? Ivy must have poisoned me.
Is that the Watchtower alarm I hear?
What I wouldn't give for a Starro attack or something.
Ollie must never know about this!
Is he one of those pervs obsessed with seeing us heroes naked?
Well count your blessings Pit, because you'll need more than luck to beat me.
There's still time for me to bounce back.
Well at least you're enjoying this Elaine.
Please stop calling me Polly.
I guess now we all know what kind of comics you've been reading...
What!? I can't believe I lost with cards like these!
Really? I lost with two pairs?
Oh come on, I thought for sure I'd win that hand!
There’s a first for everything...
This was going so well.
Well it had to happen eventually.
I felt bad for you guys, so I thought I would throw you a bone.
I’m leading so I guess this is fair.
I'm just glad Ollie isn't here to see this...
What if these boots were the sole reason I was winning?
Interested in seeing more skin?
Why do I even play this game?
It’s not so bad, you're all a pretty good distraction.
Oracle I could use some help.
You'll keep this a secret if you know what’s good for you!
You better not be recording this.
Despite losing the hand, I'm still winning.
The main attraction of the Birds of Prey has been reduced to this.
Since all of yours look so nice, I suppose I'll join the flock.
I guess I have no choice.
Is he one of those pervs obsessed with seeing us heroes naked?
Well count your blessings Pit, because you'll need more than luck to beat me.
There's still time for me to bounce back.
Well at least you're enjoying this Elaine.
Please stop calling me Polly.
I guess now we all know what kind of comics you've been reading...
What!? I can't believe I lost with cards like these!
Really? I lost with two pairs?
Oh come on, I thought for sure I'd win that hand!
I’m just setting you up, making you think you have a chance.
This was unavoidable.
Whatever, I'll win the next one.
No pain, no gain.
You all got lucky, or maybe Zatanna is helping you cheat.
Aw man, these boots were a gift from Red Arrow.
Huntress would be very disappointed if she knew about this.
Why do I even come here?
Perhaps it was a bad idea to renew my membership to the Inventory.
What should I take off next?
I guess I should try and be more flexible like Elongated Man.
I wonder if ARGUS is helping you all cheat as part of their plans.
Just keep calm, Dinah.
Wait, how'd this happen?
Guess I gotta show you the goods.
The moment you've all been waiting for:
sigh ...my last piece of clothing.
Wow, I did not expect this at ALL!
Is he one of those pervs obsessed with seeing us heroes naked?
Well count your blessings Pit, because you'll need more than luck to beat me.
There's still time for me to bounce back.
Well at least you're enjoying this Elaine.
Please stop calling me Polly.
I’m only doing this to play fair. Don’t get any bright ideas, Harley.
I guess now we all know what kind of comics you've been reading...
What!? I can't believe I lost with cards like these!
Really? I lost with two pairs?
Oh come on, I thought for sure I'd win that hand!
Okay, I will be the first to strip.
Off to a rough start, but I know how to take a hit.
This is NOT going to become a pattern.
If I didn't know any better, I would assume you are cheating.
I may be losing now.
Being lucky can only get you so far.
Do not mess with a lady's shoes!
On the heels of this loss, I might just kick your ass!
The Black Canary does not lose, you best remember that.
How do I know you aren’t cheating?
I could really use your help right about now Barbara.
Maybe I should have brought some backup... on second thought I'm not sure I'd want Helena here right now.
NO NO NO NO NO NO NO!!!
I’m feeling a scream coming on!
I’m friends with Superman, you know.
If Harley hears about this I will never live it down...
I should be fighting crime right now.
I wasn't planning on showing you the nest...
And a disproportionate amount in the States
It's not a collar! Why? Did you lose the one you were supposed to be wearing, lap dog?
Yeah I'm not exactly sure Ollie would approve of me stripping in front of everyone.
Don't bother worrying about me Pit. Now, as they say, the gloves are coming off!
Yeah they come in handy when I'm out kicking the crap out of criminals.
Some people think heels are impractical for a crime-fighter.
My what? I'm not a pirate you know.
Don't ever call me "B.C." Pit.
This thing can be a pain to get off.
sigh Yeah Pit, I guess I am.
Elaine, you have no idea how important that promise is to me right now.
You wouldn't say that if you knew what I was wearing Pit...
Careful Elaine, they might blow you away.
(I can't believe I have to show Pit my boobs.)
Well it doesn't matter 'cause he's never gonna find out.
Pit, I swear to Goddess if you make one Catwoman/pussy joke...
Off comes the choker.
My choker was getting uncomfortable anyway.
Whatever, I don't need my choker to beat you guys.
The gloves, as they say, are coming off.
My gloves aren't technically enhanced or anything. When I hit you, it's all me!
Flash once told me that my heels were impractical.
My jacket? Fine.
It's getting hot in here anyway.
This thing is hard to take off.
We are getting to some good stuff now huh?
Fine, you wanna see 'em that badly? I'll show you my abs.
Definitely not a good day to wear these.
I don't want a single a comment on my panties, okay?
I know what you all want to see.
Time to let the birds out of their cage.
If I hear one Catwoman/pussy joke, you'll hear the Canary Cry.
I almost prefer being naked instead of showing you these.
Oh god. Annie please don't ever say "banties" again.
No promises! You know I might lose control.
Hands off Hawk-boy.
Agreed, it'll be our little secret.
These bare hands will just make it hurt even more when I spank you Pit!
Give me some credit Elaine, I can do that barefoot!
I can't fly Pit! I guess I'm just so good it doesn't matter.
There's still time, no one's seen anything important yet.
These are the arms of a seasoned crime-fighter. You wanna compare muscles Pit?
What are you staring at Pit? You never seen a sports bra before?
Not one word about this to anyone! Especially you Pit!
There! One of the smoothest trims you can find.
Don’t give me that look, or I'll choke you!
Be careful, or I might just choke you.
Bare hands. All the better to spank you with.
There. My gloves are gone, no big deal.
He changed his tune when I used them to stomp on his foot.
I may be bare armed, but I'm never unarmed!
My arms are pretty badass. Should I flex?
You better give me my jacket back afterwards, it was an anniversary gift.
Of course it’s a sports bra. I'm a crimefighter! What did you expect, lingerie?
Don't act shocked, why wouldn't I wear a sports bra.
They're comfortable okay!
Don’t tell anyone about this. Especially Ollie and Batman.
They were a gag gift from Barbara okay!
Eat your heart out, Power Girl!
Shazam would have a heart attack if he saw this.
Robin would have a heart attack if he saw this.
There! Naked Canary!
Thank goodness my friends aren't here.
Whew, I thought I was gonna lose that round!
Well that was lucky, I didn't even have a pair!
Is that all it takes to beat you?
Thanks for taking that bullet for me!
That was a close call, I was certain I'd lose.
What are you going to take off, ~name~?
So, are you gonna give us a show, ~name~?
Ooh, ~name~ lost? This should be interesting!
You know the rules ~name~!
Show us what you're hiding, ~name~.
You have my attention ~name~!
Ok ~name~, it's your turn!
Oh this should be good!
Come on, ~name~! Don't let me down!
All eyes are on you ~name~!
Those are the rules, ~name~! Now show us what you got!
I knew I came to this game for a reason!
Mmm, come on, ~name~ don't let me down!
Come on, ~name~ give me something to work with!
I'm... ahh... working it. The least you could do is, ohh... make it easier for me.
Okay ~name~, make my day!
Get naked with me ~name~!
It's, mmm... a lot more enjoyable if, ahh... we're both naked ~name~!
Did you just-...?
I guess it's my lucky day!
I get to see ~name~ strip and I get to keep my clothes!
I'm off to a good start!
And my winning streak continues!
I knew this would be easy!
I get to see ~name~ strip and I get to keep my clothes!
Whew, I thought I was gonna lose that round!
Well that was lucky, I didn't even have a pair!
Is that all it takes to beat you?
Thanks for taking that bullet for me!
That was a close call, I was certain I'd lose.
So, are you gonna give us a show, ~name~?
Show us what you're hiding, ~name~.
Those are the rules, ~name~! Now show us what you got!
You lost, ~name~. Time to undress!
You lost, ~name~! Time to undress!
Good, you can join me in this strange semi-nude state.
Time to strip, ~name~.
Yes please, take something off!
Yes please. Take something off!
When you're enjoying the show it's customary to leave a tip, but I'll settle for your clothes.
Don’t be shy, ~name~, get naked with me.
Whew, I thought I was gonna lose that round!
Well that was lucky, I didn't even have a pair!
Is that all it takes to beat you?
Thanks for taking that bullet for me!
That was a close call, I was certain I'd lose.
What are you going to take off, ~name~?
So, are you gonna give us a show, ~name~?
Ooh, ~name~ lost? This should be interesting!
You know the rules ~name~!
Show us what you're hiding, ~name~.
You have my attention ~name~!
Ok ~name~, it's your turn!
Oh this should be good!
Come on, ~name~! Don't let me down!
All eyes are on you ~name~!
Those are the rules, ~name~! Now show us what you got!
I knew I came to this game for a reason!
Mmm, come on, ~name~ don't let me down!
Come on, ~name~ give me something to work with!
I'm... ahh... working it. The least you could do is, ohh... make it easier for me.
Okay ~name~, make my day!
Get naked with me ~name~!
It's, mmm... a lot more enjoyable if, ahh... we're both naked ~name~!
You're D.Va? The streamer? I think I get why Beast Boy and Robin like your stream so much.
So, do you really pilot a fighter mech, or was Beast Boy talking about a game you stream?
Another loss for you, gamer girl!
So, D.Va, did we find the secret level?
I bet people don't get to see this on your stream.
So, what part of your swashbuckling ensemble are you gonna take off first?
What are you gonna throw overboard next Elaine?
Oh yeah! Time for Elaine to dump some more cargo!
Is this it? Are we finally going to see some of your booty Elaine?
Is that a knife? Where were you even keeping that? How many weapons did you bring to this party?
Yes, Elaine lost again! It's finally time to see those gorgeous legs!
Time for the undergarments to go Elaine.
Yo ho ho, and a bottle of rum!
Got you now, Harley!
Another loss for my girl over here.
Karma is a bitch, huh?
I probably enjoy watching you strip more than I should.
Bet you wish you brought your hyenas.
And once again, you lose.
You agreed to play this, Harley.
Now I got you where I want you!
When I heard we'd be playing with a witch I pictured you as old and warty. I don't think I've ever been more wrong in my life!
What are you going to cast off next, magic girl?
So, how does your magic work? Whenever my friend Zatanna wants to cast a spell she has to speak the command backwards.
As much as I love your whole sexy school girl look, I'm more excited to see you take it off!
Finally, we're gonna see some of your important clothes disappear!
You would think all those magic tricks would make this game easier for you!
Mmm, now we're getting to some of the "forbidden" areas. Is this what you'd call "Dark Magic?"
Is the spell to make your panties disappear as sexy as it sounds?
YOU'RE the Avatar!?
I heard you can talk to the spirits of the previous Avatars... Guess they're not much help at poker!
It's so cool that you can bend all four elements!
Another loss for you, Avatar Korra!
Lost again Korra!
Maybe you should have spent more time training for tonight.
Come on, Korra, you're all about freedom right?
All right, Avatar, time to lose those panties!
I don't think we ever had a chance to greet each other. Your name was Lyn, right?
You lost, Lyn, may I call you Lyn?
It looks like you are starting to run out of accessories, Lyn
Are you finally going to take off that dress?
Finally, we get to something interesting.
Should I be professional about this? Nah.
The final piece of clothing, my little hummingbird.
That's a cute outfit, Misty, I can't wait to see you take it off!
So, do I get one of those Gym badges if I beat you at poker?
Sorry, Misty, you can't have your Pokémon fight this battle for you!
Ooh, is it time to show us your Jigglypuffs?
Ooh, is this what the world didn't get to see in those banned episodes I've heard so much about?
No need to be so shy! It's not like you have Krabbies! ...right?
Great, another demon.
Where's Constantine when you need him?
I will defeat you, demon.
Are there going to be more bats?
Not a lot of bats left, huh?
Last piece of clothing, Morrigan.
Are you actually going to strip, your grace?
There's just something different about you...
Are you as naughty as some of the Greek gods I've heard about from Diana?
I still can't believe I'm playing strip poker with a goddess.
Do you have servants to undress you at home?
Not a lot of stuff left, your grace.
Holy shit, I’m about to see Palutena, THE Goddess of Light, COMPLETLY NAKED!
So, your name is Rosalina right? Hmm, a crown and a star wand...
The Watchtower is cool and all, but it's not actually capable of space travel like the Comet Observatory.
Another bad hand Rosalina... Strip!
Come on, Rosalina, show us some leg!
Time to strip some more Princess!
Time for the final unveiling Rosalina!
That bodysuit of yours is so tight, I can't wait to see it come off!
Is it true you have a weaponized power suit? Is it like Blue Beetle's?
I really want to know how you plan on wiggling out of that suit!
Those are some nice abs, now let's see those melons you're smuggling!
Bad luck for you, but great luck for me Samus!
I like your costume Tracer, you'd fit right in at the Watchtower.
I love your accent Tracer, there's not a lot of British heroes in the League.
Looks like you lost again Tracer! Sorry, but I was kinda hoping you would.
You'll be fine, just imagine you're in the locker rooms at Overwatch.
No more stalling for time Tracer!
This really isn't your day Tracer.
You lost, Miss Schnee.
Time to strip, my lady.
Isn't this exciting, Weiss?
I don't know about you, Weiss, but I’m having a great time.
Ready to show some more skin, little princess?
Time for the final unveiling!
I wasn't expecting there to be royalty at this game!
So, are you an elf? Sorry, I just noticed the ears and couldn't help myself.
So, what are you gonna take off next, your highness?
Sorry your highness, but it's your turn again!
I bet it's exhausting having everyone always be so professional so I'm just gonna be real with you.
You lost again Zelda!
There's no need to be embarrassed Zelda, you've got one of the sexiest bodies I've ever seen!
Yes! Zelda lost again!
You are ahead of me, princess. It's only fair.
Harley, help a girl out.
I guess it's my lucky day!
I get to see ~name~ strip and I get to keep my clothes!
I'm off to a good start!
And my winning streak continues!
I knew this would be easy!
I get to see ~name~ strip and I get to keep my clothes!
Whew, I thought I was gonna lose that round!
Well that was lucky, I didn't even have a pair!
Is that all it takes to beat you?
Thanks for taking that bullet for me!
That was a close call, I was certain I'd lose.
You know the rules, ~name~.
So, are you gonna give us a show, ~name~?
Show us what you're hiding, ~name~.
Those are the rules, ~name~! Now show us what you got!
Another win for me!
Yes! It's ~name~'s turn.
Another round, another chance to see you strip, ~name~.
I'm glad I took a night off from crime-fighting, this is worth it.
Somehow this is different from the Watchtower locker rooms... More exciting!
I bet Ivy wishes she was here now.
OH, don't be upset. What did you think was going to happen when you agreed to play STRIP poker?
Time for you to take something off, ~name~! Make it something good, won't you?
Looking like the Birds of Prey locker room in here!
Join me in nudity! It's not so bad.
I’m naked, you're stripping, things are happening! Let's not stop!
Help a girl out, will you?
Oh yeah girl! Take it off!
This just keeps getting better.
Don’t be shy, ~name~, get naked with me.
You really have nothing to lose at this stage.
What, you didn't have a ring to take off? Maybe a tie pin?
Is that all?
I was hoping for more.
Are you a man? Then what's with the accessories?
Come on, just your ~clothing~?
That’s all? Just because I'm half naked doesn't mean I can't beat the crap out of you.
That’s all? Just because I'm naked doesn't mean I can't beat the crap out of you.
Not helping.
How am I supposed to get off to that?
Seriously? I'm fingering myself and that's all you take off?
How on earth did you still have your ~clothing~?
I like your eyes. Not sure why you'd hide them for so long.
You can do better.
Well, there's always next time.
That's all?
I guess I'm not one to talk.
What was even the point?
I guess there's always next time.
It'll take more than that to impress me.
I'll be waiting for the next time you lose.
You can only stall for so long you know.
I suppose this will do.
That'll have to do... For now.
You should be ashamed.
Just move on.
I'm about to shove my fist up your ass.
Now I’m just getting angry instead of horny.
What a load of crap.
Try again. And this time take off something bigger!
No No No.
What's the big secret Blake?
Mind if I get a picture with you later, it'll be fun to see how jealous the boys get.
The way he talks about you, you sound like a real hero.
Those look expensive, make sure you don't forget them here.
Aww, shame about the bandana Elaine. It really fit your whole sexy pirate look!
So, how much butt can you kick in those boots?
You need to learn to relax Hermione, you don't need your tie. You'll be so much more comfortable without it!
You're cuter than I expected.
I think if I could pick one element to bend... I'd choose water!
Oh don't be so dramatic, you were only wearing it like a belt.
Wait, you brought a sword to a game of strip poker.
Looks like you must strip, nothing you can do a-boot it.
I would be angry if it wasn't for the fact that I know what's coming next.
Are those shoes water proof? I guess they'd have to be right?
It should be against the rules to be this much of a tease.
Although you do look mostly harmless.
Holy shi...
Got to start somewhere, your Highness.
With all due respect, I was not a big fan of those armbands.
Hold on, let me get a better look at that chest...
Do you really need that many belts?
You're Princess Rosalina of the Comet Observatory aren't you!
If you're ever in Sector 2814 you should stop by the Watchtower. It's currently orbiting the planet Earth.
Have you ever met a Green Lantern before? Hal told me they patrol the whole galaxy keeping the peace.
I guess that's the downside of wearing a bodysuit to strip poker, it only counts as one item!
You'll be fine without your gloves, though I guess I'm not one to talk.
You probably won't miss those shoes, unless... Are you a speedster?
Oh man, I was so busy looking at the rest of you I didn't notice you still had your goggles.
There is no way Ollie would buy me jewelry like that.
You're fine now but are you really going to strip in-front of us peasants?
I didn't realize you'd be taking off your tiara, you're taking this seriously.
Oh right, your jewelry, ha... That's what I was thinking too...
You'll be fine without your gloves, just look at me.
Your bending's not gonna help you here!
No, you're more of a sexy magician like my friend Zatanna!
I refuse to be beaten by a maniac like you.
I was hoping for a bit more than just your ~clothing~.
Well that wasn't what I was hoping you would take off.
Smart, I guess, but SOOO boring.
That's more boring than a Hawkman story.
The point of the game is to show some skin!
My tits are out and that's the best you can do?
You see I'm naked, right, ~name~? Are you teasing me?
Not helping.
How am I supposed to get off to that?
Seriously? I'm fingering myself and that's all you take off?
How on earth did you still have your ~clothing~.
So what if you have cat ears? I know a boy with green skin that can transform into any animal.
Actually, maybe we should do it now, before you lose all of your clothes!
Hope you're not getting cold feet.
You're running out of things to take off D.Va.
Not that you need it to be sexy.
Upon closer inspection, I bet you could kick ass barefoot.
Isn't that better? Let loose! You can conjure up another tie when this is over.
And you're so buff! We should arm wrestle later... or just wrestle...
But I bet I can make you wet without any special powers!
I can see your figure much better now, very nice!
This place is crazier than I thought.
Sorry for the bad pun, I couldn't resist.
And next time there won't be an accessory to save you.
I don't know why you're so upset, it's not like your outfit covers up much anyways.
Whatever, one more bad hand and then we'll see what you've been hiding.
I'm still gonna keep an eye on you.
Bats. Why did it have to be bats?
Why would you want to cover such elegant hands?
Well you've certainly got the chest of an Amazon.
Only one belt left!
